NP. Collect all the Yggraliths, all three have different coloring a and poses. I think my order would be Yggralith Zero, Pharsis, then Phanatos. Yggralith Zero is golden (surprise, I thought it was black), Pharsis is white, and Phanatos is pitch black with greenish-white spines. Yggralith is doing its Dark Ray pose, Pharsis is just striking some flying pose, and Phanatos is in the Yggralith idle position. They're all super cool and probably the best holograms in the game (besides Telethia). I'm a bit of a Yggralith nut (pun intended) in case you can't tell.
Edit: Be prepared to do the mission sequence for Phanatos a lot. His hologram is a rare drop and took me at least 20 tries to get it. Also unequip any treasure sensor gear you have on if you want to have even the slightest chance of getting it. It's an RNG grindfest out there, but keep at it, it's totally worth!
